name: Assassin's Creed: Multiplayer Rearmed
description: Assassin's Creed Rearmed is a top down multiplayer competitive released for the iPad, iPhone & iPod Touch. The game is the spiritual successor of Assassin's Creed II: Multiplayer which also features similar top down based gameplay. The player is an agent of Abstergo Industries taking on different Animi Avatars from the Animi Training Program.
